GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /articles/:article_id.description: serves the article object with the specified article_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the specified article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment with the specified article_id, responds with the posted comment

exampleResponse.body: The article 'Living in the Shadow of a Great Man' resonates deeply. It captures the universal struggle of establishing identity alongside an extraordinary figure. The author's insight prompts reflection on personal growth amid the shadows
exampleResponse.author: rogersop
